channel.title: Help with npc drops in richscape server source v4.1
channel.description:
ok well i am using richscape cuz it pwns and well i can't figure out how to get npc's to drop E.X men npc id-1 they don't drop :S and i don't know how to make them drop plz help
ok this is edited and i was looking in the npchandler.java i think i know now but i don't know how to change the items that the men get right now its set to giants but i need help changing
p.s you ppl must think i am dumb... p.s.s if you do you can say so idc i am just a little newer to coding!!! there happy
hope someone can help :D
